Detailed Description

template<typename T, class ALLOCATOR = CDS_DEFAULT_ALLOCATOR>
class cds::details::Allocator< T, ALLOCATOR >

Extends std::allocator interface to provide semantics like operator new and delete.

The class is the wrapper around underlying ALLOCATOR class. ALLOCATOR provides the interface defined in C++ standard.

Member Function Documentation

template<typename T, class ALLOCATOR = CDS_DEFAULT_ALLOCATOR>
template<typename S >
T* cds::details::Allocator< T, ALLOCATOR >::NewArray ( size_t  nCount,
const S &  src 
) [inline]

Analogue of operator new T[nCount ].

Each item of array of type T is initialized by parameter src: T( src )
